value: *MANUSCRIPT: Authorized Generic Entry prior to Patent Expiry: Reassessing Incentives for Independent Generic Entry
*AUTHOR:     Silvia Appelt, University of Munich, silvia.appelt@lrz.uni-muenchen.de
*** (I) Limit data to medicines for human use
*Regenerate identifier of changes in producers selling products
*(1) Generate data and variables for econometric analysis
*** Date of product launch [=first launch medical product]
*Replace date retail form launch by date product launch if missing - monosubstances only (subject analysis)
*** Renaming of price, turnover and revenue variables
* Set prices of 0 to missing (and likewise turnover/revenue if equal to zero and price is missing)
*Aggregate monthly turnover and revenue data at year level [2004-2007]
*Aggregate turnover and revenue data (based on producer and retail prices): wholesale plus direct sales
****** Delete pzn_id_mod duplicates arising from the integration of historical producer information (not relevant for analysis)
*Note: some firms are classified as "no reimport" that actually have reimport products in their portfolio
*Market Attractivness: Revenues at Producer and Retail Prices
*******(II) MERGE NPI Data (Human medicines) and Patent/SPC data
*Most often one day differene across given expiry dates (in one case 7 months difference; year expiry 2015/2016)
*One day difference, year of expiry is the same
